text:
XING | iOS Developer | Hamburg, Germany | ONSITE, Full-time

The company I work for is hiring an iOS Developer with a particular focus on tooling (Xcode, Frameworks, Jenkins, etc). Languages are Swift, Objective-C, Ruby.

Perks & payment are good, Hamburg is a nice, international city to live in if you're interested in Germany.

If you're interested, contact me, my email is on my profile.
